aboutUs.title: About VENTURE
aboutUs.subtitle: We are your trusted partner in every journey, bringing you memorable and meaningful travel experiences.

mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.paragraph1: VENTURE was established with the goal of providing high-quality travel experiences, helping people discover the beauty of Vietnam and the world. We believe that travel is not just about moving from one place to another, but a journey of self-discovery and connection with new people and cultures.
mission.paragraph2: With a professional and experienced team, we are committed to creating unique, safe and inspiring journeys for all customers.

values.title: Values
values.subtitle: The values that guide all VENTURE activities

dedication.title: Dedication
dedication.description: We always put customers first and serve with sincere hearts.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Committed to delivering the highest quality travel experiences.

accompany.title: Accompany
accompany.description: Always by your side on every journey of discovery.

creative.title: Creative
creative.description: Constantly innovating to create unique travel tours.

cta.title: Ready to explore with VENTURE?
cta.subtitle: Let us accompany you on the most wonderful journeys of discovery.

terms.heroSubtitle: We are committed to providing a safe and fair experience. By using our services, you agree to these general terms.
terms.intro: The Terms of Use page presents Venture's regulations, rights, obligations and responsibilities for both users and Venture when accessing and using the service. It helps users understand how to register and manage accounts, book tours, make payments, cancellation policies, as well as intellectual property rights and legal liability limitations. Reading and agreeing to these terms ensures transparency, fairness and safety for both parties, and provides a legal basis when disputes or issues related to the use of the service arise. This page is not only a legal guide but also Venture's commitment to quality and reliability in providing services.

content.p1: By accessing, registering, or using any services provided by Venture, you agree to comply with these Terms of Use as well as all regulations, guidelines, and supplementary policies that Venture may publish. These Terms apply to all users, including but not limited to: website visitors, registered account holders, tour booking customers, and other related parties.
content.p2: Venture reserves the right to change, add to, or modify the Terms of Use at any time without prior notice. All changes will become effective from the time they are published on Venture's website or application. Your continued use of the service after any updates is deemed acceptance of the modified terms. If you do not agree with any changes, you must immediately cease using the service.

content.p1: Some Venture services require users to create an account to access and use. When registering, you commit to providing accurate, complete, and up-to-date information. Users are responsible for securing their login information, passwords, and personal data related to their accounts.
content.p2: You agree to immediately notify Venture upon detecting any unauthorized access or illegal use of your account. Venture reserves the right to suspend, restrict, or delete accounts if it detects violations of the Terms, fraudulent behavior, or illegal activities. Venture is not responsible for any damages arising from your failure to secure login information or allowing others to use your account.

content.p1: Users can book tours through Venture's website or application following the guided steps. Tour bookings are only confirmed when payment is completed and Venture sends confirmation notification. Venture provides multiple legal payment methods, including credit cards, debit cards, e-wallets, or partner payment gateways.
content.p2: Cancellation, refund, or tour schedule change policies are specified separately for each tour type and related service provider. Venture reserves the right to refuse refunds or apply cancellation fees according to specific conditions. Users are responsible for carefully reading the policies before booking tours and making payments. Venture is not responsible for costs arising outside the contract or third-party services that you choose to use independently.

content.p1: All content, images, designs, logos, icons, text, software, databases, and documents on the website, application, or other platforms are owned by Venture or legally licensed. Users are not permitted to copy, distribute, edit, publish, transfer, or use any of Venture's intellectual property for commercial or non-commercial purposes without Venture's written consent. Any violation of intellectual property rights may be handled according to current legal regulations, including compensation for damages and criminal or civil prosecution measures.

Users agree that using Venture's services is entirely voluntary and at their own personal risk. Venture is not responsible for any loss, direct or indirect damages, incurred costs, data loss, business interruption, or consequences arising from using or being unable to use the service.
content.p2: Users agree to indemnify and hold Venture, its employees, partners, suppliers, and agents free from all legal liability, costs, claims, or damages arising from:

list.item1: Violation of the Terms of Use
list.item2: Illegal conduct, fraud, or harm to third parties
list.item3: Using the service improperly or contrary to the law.

content.p1: Venture is committed to providing services in a transparent, legal manner and ensuring quality to the best extent possible. However, Venture does not guarantee that the service will always be continuous, uninterrupted, free of technical errors, or free from third-party incidents.
content.p2: To the extent permitted by law, Venture is not responsible for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages related to using or being unable to use the service, including but not limited to: data loss, business interruption, loss of profits, or costs arising from using the service. Users are responsible for protecting their personal information, data, and preparing appropriate backup measures.

privacy.heroSubtitle: We are committed to protecting your personal information, ensuring all data is processed safely, transparently and with respect for your privacy throughout your experience.
privacy.intro: Venture owns and operates an online platform that provides users with information, recommendations and services related to travel and entertainment, including tools for researching and/or booking hotels, vacation rentals and other accommodations, attractions and experiences, restaurants, flights and cruises, and other leisure services. The information you and others entrust to us helps us improve our ability to provide relevant, personalized and useful services. We highly value your trust and are committed to respecting your privacy when you access our website or use our services, and to being transparent about how we use the information you share with us. This statement describes how we collect, use and process your information, provides you with information about your rights and how you can contact us.

list.item1: Contact information, including name, phone number, postal code and email
list.item2: Payment information and other payment details
list.item5: Information related to your Venture membership status
list.item6: Photos, reviews, forum posts and social media posts, and videos you may have provided to us
list.item9: Online activities, including pages you have visited, content reviewed and applications viewed
list.item10: Other information about yourself that you have voluntarily disclosed
list.item12: Information about your travel, experiences, plans and dining preferences
list.item13: Communication information when you contact our customer service team, including incoming and outgoing calls
list.item14: Information you have provided to other third-party companies for social media login purposes. This includes public information, such as name, age and email address.

content.intro: We use your information to provide relevant content and personalized experiences, including:

list.item1: Account & Transactions: Register and manage accounts, process bookings and payments, provide promotional programs.
list.item2: Service Improvement: Analyze data to enhance services and invite you to participate in surveys or research.
list.item3: Personalization: Recommend offers, adjust content and advertising based on your preferences.
list.item4: Communication: Contact you or facilitate contact with partners, record interactions, post your content and respond to inquiries.
list.item5: Legal Compliance: Resolve disputes, prevent fraud, comply with regulations and protect rights.

content.closing: If we use automated decision-making, safeguards will be in place to ensure the right to human intervention.

content.p1: We may share your information with affiliated companies, service providers, business partners, social networks, advertising networks, trusted third parties or law enforcement agencies to provide services, process payments, personalize experiences, prevent fraud, comply with regulations and protect rights.
content.p2: Information may be transferred abroad, stored for as long as necessary, and protected by technical, administrative and physical measures (such as encryption, firewalls).
content.p3: You can adjust privacy settings or request account deletion in the "Profile" section.

slide1.title: Vietnam - Our Homeland
slide1.description: Experience amazing trips with interactive maps, explore fascinating destinations across Vietnam.

slide2.title: Discover Vietnam's Nature
slide2.description: From the Northwest mountains to Phu Quoc island, discover the diverse natural beauty of the S-shaped country.

slide3.title: Explore Misty Sapa
slide3.description: Admire the magnificent terraced fields, enjoy the cool climate and learn about the unique culture of the highland people in Sapa.

hero.searchPlaceholder: Search tours by location, tour name...

destinations.title: TOP DESTINATIONS
destinations.description: Sapa with majestic mountains, dreamy Da Lat, bustling cities and unique historical-cultural sites

provinceMap.title: TOURIST DESTINATIONS IN 63 PROVINCES
provinceMap.description: Experience travel across 63 provinces of Vietnam, explore distinctive landmarks and unique cultural features of each region
provinceMap.exploreDescription: Vietnam unfolds like a vivid painting across three regions, each possessing its own distinct beauty. All weaving together a beautiful story of nature, culture and adventures.

slide1.title: Explore Vietnam in 360°
slide1.description: Experience virtual reality of the most amazing destinations, from majestic bays to mysterious mountains.

slide2.title: Virtual Reality Travel
slide2.description: Discover Vietnam's famous landmarks through advanced 360° technology, feel like you're there.

slide3.title: Unlimited Experience
slide3.description: From UNESCO World Heritage sites to ancient streets, explore everywhere with just one click.

explore360.mainDescription: Explore 360° the most attractive natural wonders and cultural sites of the country right here.

hue.name: Hue
hue.description: Imperial capital with ancient citadel and royal tombs

halong.name: Ha Long
halong.description: UNESCO World Heritage site with thousands of limestone islands

hoian.name: Hoi An
hoian.description: Ancient town famous for lanterns and traditional architecture

hanoi.name: Hanoi
hanoi.description: Vietnam's capital with rich cultural and historical heritage

phongnha.name: Phong Nha
phongnha.description: Home to magnificent caves and national park

myson.name: My Son
myson.description: Ancient Hindu temple complex from Champa civilization

explore360.whyDescription: 360° virtual reality technology brings a completely new travel experience, helping you discover Vietnam in the most authentic and vivid way.

feature1.title: Visual Experience
feature1.description: Users can observe locations as if they were there, looking around every angle, instead of just viewing static images or videos.

feature2.title: Diverse and Comprehensive Discovery
feature2.description: Experience the space, landscape, architecture and special features of the location, making trip planning easier.

feature3.title: Increase Satisfaction
feature3.description: Customers can easily visualize the real experience, choose suitable destinations and decide to book tours quickly.

explore360.howItWorksDescription: Simple process to start exploring our 360° world

step1.title: Choose Location
step1.description: Select the destination you want to explore from the diverse list

step2.title: Explore 360°
step2.description: Experience virtual reality with the ability to rotate and zoom at every angle

step3.title: Book Real Tour
step3.description: Decide to book a real tour after exploring through 360°
